text: Ernesto Zavala (born December 2, 1972 in Burbank, California) is an American professional boxer in the Welterweight division.http://boxrec.com/media/index.php/Ernesto_Zavala ==Pro career== On March 4, 2010 Zavala knocked out the veteran Jason Davis in just three rounds, the bout was at the Shrine Exposition Center in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==External links== * Category:American boxers of Mexican descent Category:Welterweight boxers Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American male boxers Category:Boxers from California
title: Ernesto Zavala
